title: 56: OBITCH you're so arf arf n' arf...
description:
This week we’re covering a range of topics, from an elephants revenge to the death of an icon…literally. Spencer takes us through the wild origins of some deadly expressions and Madison is bringing us all things cryonic! 




SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz



Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:

https://nypost.com/2021/05/13/plastic-surgery-bank-robber-puts-money-where-mouth-is/

https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/gruesome-origins-everyday-phrases-saved-2154388

https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/560053/macabre-origins-death-related-idioms

https://www.theguardian.com/notesandqueries/query/0,5753,-2067,00.html

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_expressions_related_to_death

https://cryonics.miraheze.org/wiki/The_Jameson_Satellite

https://www.gutenberg.org/files/26906/26906-h/26906-h.htm

https://www.tomorrow.bio/post/robert-ettinger-father-of-cryonics

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Bedford

https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/20849/quick-8-eight-people-who-have-been-cryonically-preserved-and-one-who-wasnt

https://science.howstuffworks.com/life/genetic/cryonics4.htm

https://www.healthline.com/health/drugs/heparin-injectable-solution#about

https://www.conversion-metric.org/temperature/celsius-to-fahrenheit

https://www.tomorrow.bio/post/the-benefits-of-nanotechnology-in-cryonics

https://www.alcor.org/what-is-cryonics/

https://www.whsv.com/2022/06/14/woman-charged-with-felony-after-spitting-corpse-casket-funeral-home-records-show/

https://www.thesun.ie/news/7645011/tuam-graveyard-fight-thugs-blasted-disgusting-wooden-crosses/

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-10908709/India-news-Dalma-Wildlife-Sanctuary-elephant-kills-woman-returns-trample-corpse.html 

https://variety.com/2022/digital/news/internet-explorer-dead-1235294987/
